name: Smint.io Portal Archive
summary: Learn about .SIPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Smint.io allows businesses to create various types of content portals, including brand portals, media centers, press portals, and content buying portals. From these portals, users can access and retrieve various brand assets, such as images, documents, videos, and audio files.

Users who want to back up or transfer a portal's data can export that data as a SIPA file. Each SIPA file contains a copy of all the assets uploaded to a content portal. It also includes configuration and metadata files that describe the portal's page structure and resources.

instructions: You can import a SIPA file into Smint.io (Web) to add the assets and other data it contains to a content portal.
Additionally, you can extract the files a SIPA file contains using any Zip-decompression utility. Before doing so, you may first have to rename the file to use the .zip extension (instead of .sipa).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
